Title: FlipControl 3D
Description: This is a 3D Flip Control for WPF. It has a FrontSide and a BackSide. On Mouse Enter you can see the Backside.
HomeWiki:
FlipControl 3D
This is a 3D Flip Control for WPF. It has a FrontSide and a BackSide. On Mouse Enter you can see the Backside.



What is the FlipControl?
The FlipControl is a WPF Control that enables you to add Controls to a Panel at 2 Sides: as soon as you move the Mouse over the Control, it turns around and shows the Backside. All of that is in a 3D context!

The Project Page is at: http://www.meirhuber.de/Projects/wpf/flip/Default.aspx

if you are interested in contributing feel free to contact me!

- Mario
